li1: Make sure running in server, since angular reads data.json and Cross origin requests work only in server
li2: localization is achieved by introducting angular-i18n/angular-locale_zh.js, so in this case salary is ï¿¥ instead of $. Currency will change when shifting language
li3: click table header to sort asc/desc
li4: select all/none by clicking first checkbox
li5: one by one check every checkbox will automatically check first checkbox
li7: add button will add an empty row, type on the fields and click update to save. Please note clicking add button multiple times without before updating won't work well
li8: click any cell except id column, edit and then update
